About the Company: Priya Ltd is a leading distributor of computer technology products.The product range of the company includes Monitors-Digital Monitors,Flatron Monitors and LCD(Liquid Crystal Display) Monitors.Motherboards-Server Board,Socket 370,Socket 754,Socket 478 and Socket A.Processors-VIA C3 Processors and AMD Processors.ROM Drives-CD ROM,DVD ROM,CD Writer,DVD Writer and COMBO Drive.Communication Products-Modem(s).Mouse-Krypton and Smartklik.ATX Cabinet(s)-Krypton.Krypton System(s)-Voyager and Avalanche..The company also in the business segment of Chemicals, Electronics.
